top_items.author: @steipete

title.en-US: Joke about EnterpriseClaw with Java 21, Spring Boot, 2GB Docker, 45s startup
title.zh-CN: OpenClaw创始人讽刺性提议做「EnterpriseClaw」：Java 21 + Spring Boot + 14个抽象工厂bean + 2GB镜像 + 45秒启动，嘲讽企业级过度工程

summary.en-US: 系统复杂度哲学 + 极简 vs 过度工程
summary.zh-CN: 超高互动量（1402赞），创始人亲自发声，完美契合「不造奇观，建系统」的哲学——复杂度堆叠是负债而非资产

top_items.relevance: 系统复杂度哲学 + 极简 vs 过度工程
top_items.suggested_angle: 这是「建系统」的反向警示——真正的系统复利来自简洁，而非Enterprise级别的抽象层。OpenClaw的轻量恰恰是「势」的体现：快启动、低资源、高迭代。复杂的架构是新手追求奇观，高手保持极简。

js_take.en-US: This is exactly why "build systems, not spectacles" matters. Complexity is debt—OpenClaw's lightweight approach is the real "enterprise" strategy. Fast iteration beats heavy architecture every time.
js_take.zh-CN: This is exactly why "build systems, not spectacles" matters. Complexity is debt—OpenClaw's lightweight approach is the real "enterprise" strategy. Fast iteration beats heavy architecture every time.

top_items.author: @steipete

title.en-US: Joining OpenAI to bring agents to everyone. OpenClaw becoming a foundation: open, independent, just getting started
title.zh-CN: Peter Steinberger宣布加入OpenAI，致力于将agent带给每个人，同时OpenClaw将成为基金会运作，保持开源独立

summary.zh-CN: 超高互动量（11105赞，1839收藏），创始人亲自官宣，确定OpenClaw将作为独立基金会继续运作

top_items.suggested_angle: 这是「不争之争」的最高境界——创始人进入大厂推动agent普及，项目本身保持开源独立。真正的「道」不是控制，而是让生态自我生长。当OpenClaw成为基金会，它不再是任何人的资产，而是「里世界」的基础设施。

js_take.en-US: This is "bu zheng zhi zheng" (不争之争) at its finest — the founder scales through OpenAI while the project returns to the commons. When OpenClaw becomes a foundation, it stops being property and starts becoming infrastructure. That's the Dao of open systems.
js_take.zh-CN: This is "bu zheng zhi zheng" (不争之争) at its finest — the founder scales through OpenAI while the project returns to the commons. When OpenClaw becomes a foundation, it stops being property and starts becoming infrastructure. That's the Dao of open systems.

top_items.author: @heyshrutimishra

title.en-US: 700 million Chinese users can deploy AI agents via Baidu search bar, OpenClaw through Baidu AI Cloud
title.zh-CN: 7亿中国用户现在可以通过百度搜索栏部署AI Agent，百度AI云支持OpenClaw一键部署，无需终端、Docker或开发环境

summary.en-US: OpenClaw + Baidu + 中国市场大规模部署
summary.zh-CN: 触及OpenClaw进入中国市场的重要节点，7亿用户无门槛部署是「里世界」普及的关键一步

top_items.relevance: OpenClaw + Baidu + 中国市场大规模部署
top_items.suggested_angle: 这是「里世界」的中国加速度——7亿用户从搜索栏部署Agent，不是技术进步，是入口革命。当部署门槛降到零，人群分化将彻底加速。

js_take.en-US: Inner world's China acceleration—700M users deploying Agents from search bar. Not tech progress, entry point revolution. When deployment hits zero friction, demographic divergence goes supersonic.
js_take.zh-CN: Inner world's China acceleration—700M users deploying Agents from search bar. Not tech progress, entry point revolution. When deployment hits zero friction, demographic divergence goes supersonic.
